alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 04 at 8:16PM CDT until October 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier For the Calcasieu River...including Glenmora, Oakdale, Oberlin, Kinder, White Oak Park, Salt Water Barrier...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday evening at 700 PM CDT. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TOMORROW MORNING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near Salt Water Barrier. * WHEN...From tomorrow morning to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...Minor marshland flooding occurs. Flooding also begins on River Road in north Lake Charles. Due to ongoing drought conditions and a quick crest to flood stage, these impacts are unlikely. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 4.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
